description:
Spence has a girlfriend, but I think he's had a bit of experience with the guys as well. He loves to play soccer and he's a part-time personal trainer.
A friend of mine referred him about six weeks ago, but at the time Spence had taken a break from the gym and wasn't as toned as he wanted to be. He was anxious to do a film, so he hit the gym hard and to my amazement he came back a few later with a six-pack and a totally hot body!
title: Spence
